## Grants, Fellowships, and Awards

```{r}

here("data", "funding.csv") %>% 
  read.csv() %>% 
  filter(result == "Awarded") %>% 
  arrange(desc(year)) %>% 
  slice(-n()) %>% 
  mutate(y = glue::glue("{FOT}, {organization}. \"{title}\". PI: {PI}.<br><br>")) %>% 
  select(year, y) %>% 
  cv_bibble()

```
